field.comment: All dynamic Blocks, separated with Comma

field.comment: All Action to refresh lazy blocks, separated with Comma

field.comment: All lazy Blocks, separated with Comma

field.label: Uri Params
field.comment: All Uri Params, separated with Comma. Params enclosed with "/" are treated as regular expression.

field.label: Add Layered Navigation Attributes To Uri Params
field.comment: If set to yes, all attributes that are set to show in the layered navigation will automatically get added to the list of Uri Params.

field.label: Miss Uri Params
field.comment: Ignore Requests with this parameters. Regex separated with comma.

field.label: Category Session Params
field.comment: All Session Params, separated with comma. Works only on category pages.

field.label: Customer Group Caching
field.comment: Only enable if you have different price or layout for different customer groups.

field.label: Show Age
field.comment: Show the age of a page in header

field.label: gzcompress Level
field.comment: Compress the cache (only for filecache, flush Lesti_Fpc after changing value)
